message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget, but $9,000 is too low for me to consider. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
